Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human skin fibroblasts:71.47% Cell death=100 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis MUMC 408(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus MUMC 377(no activity data),Pseudomonas aeruginosa MUMC 266(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Escherichia coli MUMC 106(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Candida albicans MUMC 29(no activity data),Microsporum audouinii MUMC 545(MIC=6µg/ml),Aspergillus niger MUMC 77(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Trichophyton mentagrophytes MUMC 665(MIC=6µg/ml),Dalton's lymphoma ascites(IC50=2.62µM),Ehrlich's ascites carcinoma(IC50=6.37µM),Megascolex konkanensis(LD=2000µg/ml),Pontoscolex corethrurus(LD=2000µg/ml),Eudrilus eugeniae(LD=2000µg/ml),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(IC50=13.52µg/ml),Dalton's lymphoma ascites(IC50=2.62µM),Ehrlich's ascites carcinoma(IC50=6.17µM),Human colon adenocarcinoma HT29(IC50=11.87±0.0021µg/ml)
